mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from K. P. Julian to Dr. and Mrs. Stigleman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from K. P. Julian to Dr. and Mrs. Stigleman requesting that they set a date for his marriage to their daughter, Mattie, dated September 6, 1883, 2 photocopied pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
